about_the_game:
Worldview


A world where mechanical and magical civilizations intersect.
Become a new god, build multiple civilizations, and sometimes make them fight each other, sometimes cooperate to create a new history.
You will need to make repeated choices and calculations to maintain a balance in production, economy, population, prosperity, and more.
Your civilization will develop science, discover the essence of magic, and eventually become a superior civilization and be able to relate to all worlds.

As the new god who reigns over the world of Croswa, the fate of the world is in your hands!

Excerpts of functions and contents


・Construction of various facilities
・Management of a unique economic system
・Researching technology
・Expanding the town
・Build multiple civilizations in multiple stages
・Trade and war with other civilizations you have built so far
・Other

Author's message


This game is a personal work, and due to time and other restrictions, it is not of high quality.
I will check the opinions written in the reviews and incorporate them rationally into the game in the future.

Some of the current bad points


・Some AI-generated materials are used, and the visuals of the facilities on the stage are particularly poor.
・Some of the other images and sounds are also purchased from asset stores, etc., and are lacking in originality.
・Lack of effects and animations, and the game screen movement is not fun.
・The game has an event system, but there are still few stories.
・The accuracy of the English translation is low.
・The game is still incomplete, and there is still little content related to the main concept of "machine civilization and magical civilization intersecting".

Some of the current good points of the author (depending on the "god", this may be a bad thing.)


・Even though the game is still incomplete, some people can play it for about 10 hours.
・A special "value-added equilibrium system".
・In order to build multiple civilizations, it is necessary to build new civilizations multiple times, using new technologies and skills acquired each time.

Era information


・Current game development reached era: 3rd era
・Total number of eras: Varies by civilization type
